BR_text.BRdescription:
Doc.noun_chunks_iterator will be set to None under certain condition. Doc.noun_chunks call Doc.noun_chunks_iterator without checking will raise TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable
 I will make a PR to fix this bug later.
